name: Johnny Why Are You Late
description:
Get to play as a husband who is late for work as you tumble around your house picking up items and solving puzzles.

What happened the morning you were late for work? In this funny point and click room escape game you have to use things inside your house to figure out how to solve the current condition. You must also combine certain items, solve puzzles and more!
Try to get 5 achievements and set the best in the online leaderboard.
